[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [QueryOptions](./extensions.queryoptions.md)

## QueryOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface QueryOptions<TQueryFnData = unknown, TError = unknown, TData = TQueryFnData>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                 | Modifiers | Type                                                                       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [enabled?](./extensions.queryoptions.enabled.md)                                         |           | boolean                                                                    | _(Optional)_ Set this to <code>false</code> to disable automatic refetching when the query mounts or changes query keys. To refetch the query, use the <code>refetch</code> method returned from the <code>useQuery</code> instance. Defaults to <code>true</code>.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [initialData?](./extensions.queryoptions.initialdata.md)                                 |           | TData \| (() =&gt; TData \| undefined)                                     | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [initialDataUpdatedAt?](./extensions.queryoptions.initialdataupdatedat.md)               |           | number \| (() =&gt; number \| undefined)                                   | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [keepPreviousData?](./extensions.queryoptions.keeppreviousdata.md)                       |           | boolean                                                                    | _(Optional)_ Set this to <code>true</code> to keep the previous <code>data</code> when fetching based on a new query key. Defaults to <code>false</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [meta?](./extensions.queryoptions.meta.md)                                               |           | Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;                                              | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [onError?](./extensions.queryoptions.onerror.md)                                         |           | (err: TError) =&gt; void                                                   | _(Optional)_ This callback will fire if the query encounters an error and will be passed the error.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [onSettled?](./extensions.queryoptions.onsettled.md)                                     |           | (data: TData \| undefined, error: TError \| null) =&gt; void               | _(Optional)_ This callback will fire any time the query is either successfully fetched or errors and be passed either the data or error.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [onSuccess?](./extensions.queryoptions.onsuccess.md)                                     |           | (data: TData) =&gt; void                                                   | _(Optional)_ This callback will fire any time the query successfully fetches new data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [placeholderData?](./extensions.queryoptions.placeholderdata.md)                         |           | TQueryFnData \| (() =&gt; TQueryFnData \| undefined)                       | _(Optional)_ If set, this value will be used as the placeholder data for this particular query observer while the query is still in the <code>loading</code> data and no initialData has been provided.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [refetchInterval?](./extensions.queryoptions.refetchinterval.md)                         |           | number \| false                                                            | _(Optional)_ If set to a number, the query will continuously refetch at this frequency in milliseconds. If set to a function, the function will be executed with the latest data and query to compute a frequency. Defaults to <code>false</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [refetchIntervalInBackground?](./extensions.queryoptions.refetchintervalinbackground.md) |           | boolean                                                                    | _(Optional)_ If set to <code>true</code>, the query will continue to refetch while their tab/window is in the background. Defaults to <code>false</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [refetchOnMount?](./extensions.queryoptions.refetchonmount.md)                           |           | boolean \| 'always'                                                        | _(Optional)_ If set to <code>true</code>, the query will refetch on mount if the data is stale. If set to <code>false</code>, will disable additional instances of a query to trigger background refetches. If set to <code>'always'</code>, the query will always refetch on mount. Defaults to <code>true</code>.                                                                                                                      |
| [refetchOnReconnect?](./extensions.queryoptions.refetchonreconnect.md)                   |           | boolean \| 'always'                                                        | _(Optional)_ If set to <code>true</code>, the query will refetch on reconnect if the data is stale. If set to <code>false</code>, the query will not refetch on reconnect. If set to <code>'always'</code>, the query will always refetch on reconnect. If set to a function, the function will be executed with the latest data and query to compute the value. Defaults to the value of <code>networkOnline</code> (<code>true</code>) |
| [refetchOnWindowFocus?](./extensions.queryoptions.refetchonwindowfocus.md)               |           | boolean \| 'always'                                                        | _(Optional)_ If set to <code>true</code>, the query will refetch on window focus if the data is stale. If set to <code>false</code>, the query will not refetch on window focus. If set to <code>'always'</code>, the query will always refetch on window focus. Defaults to <code>true</code>.                                                                                                                                          |
| [retry?](./extensions.queryoptions.retry.md)                                             |           | boolean \| number \| ((failureCount: number, error: TError) =&gt; boolean) | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [retryDelay?](./extensions.queryoptions.retrydelay.md)                                   |           | number \| ((failureCount: number, error: TError) =&gt; number)             | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [retryOnMount?](./extensions.queryoptions.retryonmount.md)                               |           | boolean                                                                    | _(Optional)_ If set to <code>false</code>, the query will not be retried on mount if it contains an error. Defaults to <code>true</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [staleTime?](./extensions.queryoptions.staletime.md)                                     |           | number                                                                     | _(Optional)_ The time in milliseconds after data is considered stale. If set to <code>Infinity</code>, the data will never be considered stale.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
